- The price elasticity of a Bitcoin transactor is high. Even in significantly higher fee environments Bitcoin block space demand will grow.

A crypto merchant transaction has 3 costs for the consumer:

Miner Fees: on-chain fee paid to miners 
Market Fee: bid/ask spread, book depth
Volatility Fee: fluctuations in price from cost basis to sale 

Focusing on miner fees and ignoring the other two is absurd
